scripts.test: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach --no-private run test --passWithNoTests
scripts.lint: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach --no-private run lint
scripts.markdown:lint: yarn markdownlint docs/README.md docs/pages/**/*.md packages/*/README.md examples/*/README.md README.md
scripts.markdown:lint-fix: yarn markdownlint --fix docs/README.md docs/pages/**/*.md packages/*/README.md examples/*/README.md README.md
scripts.markdown:linkcheck: yarn markdown-link-check --config .markdown-linkcheck.json docs/README.md docs/pages/**/*.md packages/*/README.md examples/*/README.md README.md
scripts.build: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -v -t --no-private run build
scripts.build:dev: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -v -t --no-private run build-dev
scripts.clean: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -p --no-private run clean
